fulltext:
NGUYEN TUAN ANH
Branch Manager | Hospitality & Amusement Industry
I want to succeed in an environment of stimulating, growing and challenging to meet personal and organizational goals.
To work in an enviroment where I could constantly learn and gain expertise to develop competency and enhance my skills.
